ygData.msgSnippet: Galvatron followed the bots landing and kneed him in the chest as he fell. Completkey defenceless Galvatron Picked the bot up wrapped him up in his tail

Subject: Galvatron spare parts

From: Robert Thomas <Kinger1984@...>

 Galvatron followed the bots landing and kneed him in
the chest as he fell. Completkey defenceless Galvatron
Picked the bot up wrapped him up in his tail
imoblizing his arms and legs with his gigantic tail.
Galvatron flew off back into the destron base because
it was so close to the battle it took a minute to
reach. He entered holding his prisoner. "I was hopeing
(he said in a comm to Magma) you could find a way to
make this bot useful. Say a mind contro, chip of some
sort. Im sure Guiledart as a couple to spare. " He
used the sharp end of his tail to slash across the
bots throat. "There no more trouble."
--- Rudra656@... wrote:
> ::Amperion::
>     After the battle at the CF Amperion wandered off
> into the distance 
> crossing Africa into Asia.  He headed more or less
> northeast for no apparent 
> reason.
>
